Articles.Content:
Oh wow... This game is too much fun!

Hey guys, Pest here, I went on a long hiatus (I left around 0.18) because my terrible 2GB RAM laptop (now at 8GB!) wouldn't run KSP all that well...

Now that I upped the RAM, I really started missing the game and re-downloaded it!

First impressions 100% blew me outta my seat, yet, I have so much to re-learn like last time! Well, I better post this and get back to playing and

learning all of the things that I missed!

I am a big music enthusiast, guitar player (and kit builder on the occasion), astronomy lover, all the fun stuff in a teenager!

Oh, and kudos to Squad on the Career mode, even though it isn't finished, it's awesome!

Cheers,

Pest
Welcome back! Good luck with your rockets!
Hey Xacktar, thanks for the welcome! I'm re-learning my old skills really fast now!
